name: Dungeon kitten
description:
My first "real" game I made for my second year at Albert Jacquard.

You're a kitten in a dungeon,

You move by clicking on the squares next to you, each time you move your energy reduce and you gain +1 level,

Each 10 levels you can upgrade yourself,

To regen energy you need to rest in bed, but to rest you need to have some food

The goal of the game is to find and beat Dr Saumon, who's stealing the ressources of the dungeon

Tips - you can maintain left click to have a pop up with the infos of your next move
